1.0.name: wordpress/tedtalks-for-wordpress
1.0.description: A filter for WordPress that displays ted.com videos based on the Youtube WordPress plugin by Joern Zaefferer. Copy and paste the TedTalks "Embed Video" code to a text editor and look for the .flv filename of the flashvideo. (eg.: JOHNMAEDA-2007_high.flv ). In WordPress type: [TEDTALKS JOHNMAEDA-2007_high.flv].
